column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My best friend was having a birthday party in a few days , so I wanted to make her cake that everyone would love .
#text=I looked through my book of recipes and found a recipe for chocolate cake that looked delicious .
#text=The recipe had a list of ingredients and steps for making the cake .
#text=I read the whole thing to make sure I did n't have to go to the store to buy any of the food or cooking supplies needed to make the cake .
#text=It said I needed a big bowl , a mixer , a spatula , measuring cups , a pot , and a baking dish .
#text=I took each of these out of my cabinets and placed them on the table so they were ready to use .
#text=Then it said I needed two eggs , flour , sugar , milk , chocolate , and frosting .
#text=I took these out of my cabinets and refrigerator so that they were ready as well .
#text=Once I was sure I had everything I needed , I started reading the instructions again , one by one .
#text=On the first step , I had to preheat the oven by turning it to the right temperature early so that it is warm enough to bake when I am ready to put the batter inside .
#text=Then I had to start making the batter .
#text=First I cracked the eggs into the big bowl and threw away the shells .
#text=Then I used my measuring cups to very carefully scoop the exact amount of flour the recipe asked for and poured it in the bowl .
#text=Next I measured and poured the sugar and milk the same way .
#text=I put the mixer into the bowl and turned it on for a minute .
#text=When I turned it off again , I could no longer see each ingredient , and the batter looked like sticky goop instead .
#text=The recipe then said to melt the chocolate on the stove in the pot .
#text=I put the chocolate in the pot on the stove , turned it on , and watched it turn from solid to liquid .
#text=Then I poured it into the big bowl and mixed it up again .
#text=Once I had my chocolate batter , I gently poured it into my baking dish and was ready to put it into the oven .
#text=I put on oven mitts to protect my hands from the heat and carefully put the dish into the oven .
#text=Following the recipe 's instructions , I set the oven timer for an hour and waited for it to bake .
#text=Once I heard the timer chime , I put on the oven mitts again and took the cake out to cool .
#text=I turned the oven off and waited for the cake to cool down .
#text=The batter was now soft and firm instead of goop .
#text=Once it was cool , I put it on a plate and spread the frosting all over it with my spatula .
